title: Kona Grill
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of chain Japanese food and sushi bar restaurant. Though it's predominately fish and meat, on its website look under menu-lifestyle tab you will also see vegan and vegetarian choices. Vegan including cucumber or avocado rolls, roasted asparagus salad, pan Asian noodles, and oriental salad. It's near Camden Yards stadium in downtown and is loud and crowded on game nights.
